item.title: 美国关税威胁破坏越南历史性工业繁荣
item.description:
经济繁荣使这个拥有一亿人口的国家摆脱了贫困。然后是特朗普的 "地毯式拉扯"。【原文：

An economic boom lifted the country of 100 million out of poverty. Then came the Trump rug-pull.

】

item.title: 声名狼藉的俄罗斯黑客杜克尤金背后的秘密
item.description: 声名狼藉的俄罗斯黑客杜克尤金背后的秘密【原文：The Mystery Behind Notorious Russian Hacker DukeEugene】

item.title: 安赛乐米塔尔将在加拿大重组中关闭安大略线材厂
item.description: 安赛乐米塔尔钢铁公司（ArcelorMittal SA）将关闭其位于安大略省的线材拉拔厂，153 名员工将因此受到影响，而加拿大的钢铁行业正在努力应对美国对金属征收关税的影响。【原文：Steelmaker ArcelorMittal SA is closing its wire drawing mill in Ontario, affecting 153 employees when Canada’s steel industry is grappling with the impacts of US tariffs on the metal.】

item.title: 新一代加密货币交易所交易基金在美国证券交易委员会审查后接近现实
item.description: 美国监管机构已要求竞相推出索拉纳交易所交易基金的华尔街公司修改他们的文件，这表明这种新型加密投资产品可能很快就会向投资者推出。【原文：US regulators have asked Wall Street firms racing to launch Solana exchange-traded funds to revise their paperwork, a sign that the novel crypto investment products may be available to investors soon.】

item.title: 冈德拉克称美国国债 "大限将至
item.description: DoubleLine Capital 的杰弗里-冈德拉克（Jeffrey Gundlach）说，美国的债务负担和利息支出已经 "难以为继"，这意味着长期美国国债不再被视为合法的无风险投资。【原文：America’s debt burden and interest expense have become “untenable,” and that means long-term US Treasury bonds are no longer seen as legitimate risk-free investments, said DoubleLine Capital’s Jeffrey Gundlach.】

item.title: 保罗-都铎-琼斯预测明年美元将暴跌 10
item.description: 保罗-都铎-琼斯（Paul Tudor Jones）认为，随着短期利率大幅下降，美元将在明年下跌。【原文：Paul Tudor Jones sees the US dollar dropping over the next year as short-term interest rates fall sharply, he said.】

item.title: 美国关税收入再创新高，帮助缩减五月赤字
item.description: 5 月份，美国关税攀升至创纪录水平，帮助缩减了当月的预算赤字，但随着特朗普政府与贸易伙伴谈判并面临征税问题的司法挑战，人们对关税流入的持续性仍存疑虑。【原文：US customs duties climbed to a record in May, helping shrink the budget deficit for the month, while doubts remain about the persistence of the inflows as the Trump administration negotiates with trading partners and faces a judicial challenge over its levies.】

item.title: 私人和公共债务市场有望在信贷 3.0 时代实现融合
item.description: Clearlake Capital Group 联合创始人何塞-费利西亚诺（José Feliciano）认为，私人信贷和公共信贷正在融合，他预计这一趋势将在未来 10 年主导金融市场的演变。【原文：Private and public credit are converging as we speak, according to Clearlake Capital Group co-founder José Feliciano, who expects the trend to dominate financial-market evolution over the next 10 years.】

item.title: 美国将出口管制作为中国贸易谈判的一部分进行谈判
item.description: 中美两国本周举行的贸易谈判巩固了华盛顿对两国经济关系的态度所发生的巨大变化：美国的出口限制措施旨在防止敏感技术落入中国政府之手，而现在双方明确表示要进行谈判。【原文：Trade talks between the US and China this week cemented a seismic change in Washington’s approach to the countries’ economic relationship: US export curbs, meant to keep sensitive technologies out of Beijing’s hands, are now explicitly up for negotiation.】

item.title: 太空公司 Voyager Technologies 在扩大首次公开募股规模后大涨 139
item.description: Voyager Technologies Inc. 公司在美国首次公开募股中筹集了 3.83 亿美元，首次上市后股价涨幅高达 139%。【原文：Voyager Technologies Inc. shares gained as much as 139% in their debut after the company raised $383 million in an upsized US initial public offering.】

item.title: 加密货币绑架案嫌疑人不认罪，被免予保释
item.description: 两名男子被指控绑架并折磨一名意大利游客，企图迫使他交出加密货币账户的访问权限，他们对指控他们犯有一级绑架罪的起诉书表示不认罪。【原文：Two men accused of kidnapping and torturing an Italian tourist in an attempt to force him to turn over access to his cryptocurrency accounts pleaded not guilty to an indictment charging them with first-degree kidnapping.】

item.title: Meta 为新的人工智能实验室聘请来自谷歌和芝麻公司的顶尖研究人员
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司从多家科技公司（包括 Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌公司）挖来了顶尖工程师，组建了一个新团队，致力于实现更先进的人工智能，即人工通用智能。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. has poached top engineers from multiple tech firms, including Alphabet Inc.’s Google, for a new team focused on achieving a more advanced form of AI called artificial general intelligence.】

item.title: 保罗-都铎-琼斯（Paul Tudor Jones）担心人工智能带来的失业将加剧社会分化
item.description: 保罗-都铎-琼斯（Paul Tudor Jones）说，他担心人工智能导致的失业可能对社会造成影响，并敦促政界人士考虑如何最好地监管这项技术。【原文：Paul Tudor Jones said he’s concerned about potential societal fallout from artificial intelligence-driven job losses and urged politicians to consider how to best regulate the technology.】

item.title: 稀土初创企业希望从巴西的 10 亿美元赏金中分一杯羹
item.description: 希望利用稀土需求激增的矿产勘探者们正在争夺巴西近 10 亿美元的资金，以帮助他们在这个仅次于中国、拥有最大稀土储量的国家实现自己的项目。【原文：Mineral explorers hoping to tap into surging demand for rare earths are vying for a slice of nearly $1 billion in Brazilian funding to help make their projects a reality in a nation with the biggest reserves after China.】

item.title: 加拿大广播公司称加拿大和美国就贸易协议交换工作文件
item.description: 加拿大广播公司（CBC News）周三援引匿名消息来源报道称，美国和加拿大官员正在交换一份概述潜在贸易协议条款的文件。【原文：US and Canadian officials are exchanging a document outlining potential trade deal terms, CBC News reported on Wednesday, citing anonymous sources, who said the paper is seen as a step toward a new trade pact.】

item.title: 美国监管机构寻求缩减一分钟债券交易报告制度
item.description: 美国金融监管机构希望收回拜登政府期间推出的将部分固定收益交易报告时间缩减至一分钟的措施，呼吁将许多债券交易的披露时间恢复到 15 分钟的现状。【原文：US financial regulators want to roll back measures introduced during the Biden administration that slashed some fixed-income trade reporting to just one minute, calling to return to the 15-minute status quo for disclosing many bond transactions.】

item.title: Wealthsimple 首席执行官 Michael Katchen 表示，随着资产规模突破 500 亿美元，IPO 仍是目标
item.description: 名人支持的 Wealthsimple Financial Corp. 公司负责人表示，随着金融科技公司的客户资产激增，没有必要急于进行首次公开募股。【原文：The head of celebrity-backed Wealthsimple Financial Corp. says there’s no need to rush into an initial public offering as the fintech sees a surge in client assets.】

item.title: 尽管美国一再拖延，欧洲仍将重申向俄罗斯施压的计划
item.description: 欧洲将重申其支持乌克兰和制裁俄罗斯的承诺，而美国将推迟就向莫斯科施加更大压力以促使总统弗拉基米尔-普京坐到谈判桌前一事做出决定。【原文：Europe will reiterate its commitment to back Ukraine and sanction Russia, as the US delays a decision over increasing pressure on Moscow to get President Vladimir Putin to the negotiating table.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德（Brookfield）在人事调整中任命男爵为房地产集团首席执行官
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）任命拥有 20 年丰富经验的 Lowell Baron 为其房地产业务的新任首席执行官，全球最大的房地产所有者之一对该部门的领导层进行了调整。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management tapped 20-year veteran Lowell Baron as the new chief executive officer of its real estate business, as one of the world’s biggest property owners reshuffles the leadership of that unit.】

item.title: 普洛斯称盈利可能因电子商务和腾讯而翻番
item.description: Prosus NV 表示，在上一财年，公司的每股收益可能增长近一倍，因为公司的电子商务业务增长加快，而且公司在中国互联网公司腾讯控股有限公司（Tencent Holdings Ltd. ）的持股价值飙升。【原文：Prosus NV said its earnings per share likely nearly doubled in the last fiscal year after growth at its e-commerce businesses accelerated and the value of its holding in Chinese internet company Tencent Holdings Ltd. surged.】

item.title: 卢特尼克称欧盟可能处于美国贸易协议的 "最末端
item.description: 商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）表示，随着美国政府急于与其他贸易伙伴达成关税协议，与欧盟达成的协议很可能是美国最后完成的协议之一。【原文：Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said the European Union is likely to be among the last deals that the US completes, as the administration rushes to secure tariff agreements with other trading partners.】

item.title: 波兰财政风险为图斯克连任蒙上阴影
item.description: 波兰总理唐纳德-图斯克（Donald Tusk）尽管赢得了议会对其内阁的信任投票，但未能消除人们对其被削弱的政府议程的疑虑。【原文：Poland’s Prime Minister Donald Tusk failed to dispel doubts about his weakened government’s agenda despite winning a parliamentary vote of confidence in his cabinet.】

item.title: 英国海军向霍尔木兹海峡附近船只发出罕见警告
item.description: 英国海军罕见地向海员发出警告，中东地区的紧张局势加剧可能会影响航运，包括通过霍尔木兹海峡的航运。【原文：The UK Navy issued a rare warning to mariners that higher tensions in the Middle East could impact shipping, including through the Strait of Hormuz.】

item.title: 西班牙电网否认停电前电压处理不当的报道
item.description: 西班牙电网运营商 Red Electrica 否认在 4 月 28 日全国大停电前几分钟采取了任何异常行动。【原文：Spanish grid operator Red Electrica denies it took any action that was out of the ordinary in the minutes before a blackout hit the country on April 28.】

item.title: DeepSeek 取得突破后，阿里巴巴员工假期都在工作
item.description: 今年 1 月，DeepSeek 以其低成本、功能强大的人工智能模型震惊了全球科技行业，阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司的工程师们取消休假，在春节假期期间加班加点，奋起直追。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.’s engineers canceled vacations and worked through the Chinese New Year holiday to play catch up after DeepSeek shocked the global tech industry with its low-cost, powerful artificial-intelligence model in January.】

item.title: 美国在巴拿马更换华为塔台以 "对抗中国
item.description: 美国驻巴拿马大使馆表示，随着唐纳德-特朗普政府在该地区加强对中国的立场，美国正在用美国技术替换华为技术有限公司的电信塔。【原文：The US embassy in Panama said it is replacing Huawei Technologies Co.’s telecommunication towers with US technology as the administration of Donald Trump intensifies its stance against China in the region.】

item.title: 法国电力公司（EDF）发现反应堆管道有新裂缝的迹象，法国核电困境是否会卷土重来？
item.description: 法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）发现有迹象表明，一座不到三年前修好的核反应堆的管道可能又出现了 "应力腐蚀 "裂缝，这再次引发了人们对该国电力供应可靠性的担忧。【原文：Electricite de France SA has found indications that “stress corrosion” cracks may have returned to pipes at a nuclear reactor fixed less than three years ago, renewing fears about the reliability of the country’s power supply.】

item.title: 贝森特预测美国今年预算赤字将接近 7
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）指责民主党人，他预测今年将再次出现异常庞大的预算赤字。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent blamed Democrats for what he predicted will be another unusually large budget deficit this year.】

item.title: 支付公司 Stripe 将收购加密钱包提供商 Privy
item.description: Stripe 公司同意收购加密货币钱包提供商 Privy，这是在该支付公司最近收购稳定币基础设施公司 Bridge 的基础上进行的。【原文：Stripe Inc. agreed to acquire crypto wallet provider Privy, building on the payment company’s recent acquisition of stablecoin infrastructure firm Bridge.】
